tool_description: Twishort API can be used by Twitter applications to post the long text to Twishort, and receive a tweet-sized message with a link to the complete post.
name: Twishort
title: Twishort

api_list.name: post
api_list.description: Post the long text to Twishort, and receive a tweet-sized message with a link to the complete post.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.default: Long long long long long text...
